pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering High Dimensional Data with Hidden Markov Model on Variable Blocks // Clustering of high dimensional data with Hidden Markov Model on Variable Blocks (HMM-VB) fitted via Baum-Welch algorithm. Clustering is performed by the Modal Baum-Welch algorithm (MBW), which finds modes of the density function. Lin Lin and Jia Li (2017) http://jmlr.org/papers/v18/16-342.html.
